data: `minecraft:behavior.follow_caravan` allows an entity to be lead with a `Lead` item. Leading the entity actually signals up to ten nearby entities that have been set in the `entity_types` variable to follow each other, forming a caravan.

data.Name: entity_count
data.Description: Number of entities that can be in the caravan

data.Name: [entity_types](../Definitions/NestedTables/entity_types.md)
data.Description: List of entity types that this mob can follow in a caravan

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
